channel.title: 637 Starter location
channel.description:
Hey guys, this is probably stupid, i know, basically need help with changing the starting location of the 637 source I got. I've been searching and searching for hours. no joke.
What I've searched for:
Starting location when you login for first time Tele location for home Searched and looked in the files that contain 'starter' 'location' 'starting' 'home' 'X , Y co-ordinates when char spawns'
I simply cannot find anything to do with changing home location co-ords
Somebody help? Will Rep++
Thanks guys
